com.ucd.comp41690.team21.zenze.game.components

Class CameraAI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ucd.comp41690.team21.zenze.game.components.CameraAI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InputComponent

    public class CameraAI
extends java.lang.Object
implements InputComponent
    moves the camera horizontally according to players position and level borders

    • Constructor Summary

      initialises a new camera object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • CameraAI

        public CameraAI(int movementWindow,
                GameObject focus,
                float viewFrustum,
                float minSpeed,
                float maxSpeed,
                int rightBorder)
        initialises a new camera object
        Parameters:
        movementWindow - the players movement window for which the camera should not change its position
        focus - the object to follow, probably the player in most cases
        viewFrustum - used to lock the camera at the end/beginning of the level
        minSpeed - the minimum acceleration of the camera
        maxSpeed - the max speed, should optimally equal the players speed
        rightBorder - the right border of the level

    • Method Detail

      • handleInput

        public void handleInput(GameObject object)
        updates the cameras position
        Specified by:
        handleInput in interface InputComponent
        Parameters:
        object - the camera to update
